channel.title: Harbor on ljzsdut
channel.description: Recent content in Harbor on ljzsdut

item.description: v1.10.1参考文档 https://goharbor.io/docs/2.3.0/install-config/ 安装docker-compose yum install -y docker-compose 修改harbor配置文件 [root@bigdata-pm services]# tar xf harbor-offline-installer-v1.10.1.tgz [root@bigdata-pm services]# ll harbor/ total 662120: -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 3398 Feb 10 14:18 common.sh -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 677974489 Feb 10 14:19 harbor.v1.10.1.tar.gz -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 5882 Feb 10 14:18 harbor.yml -rwxr-xr-x 1 root root 2284 Feb 10 14:18 install.sh -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 11347 Feb 10 14:18 LICENSE -rwxr-xr-x 1 root root 1749 Feb 10 14:18 prepare 根据需要，对harbor.
